title: Can't see my own club.
body: I am the leader of the club Big Big Feeders, clan tag Big$. I cannot see my own club, and cannot invite people to join it. I do not have my clan tag when we play games together. Please help me.

Hey, Targon I'm having the same issue can you help me out?
Sure, can you provide me the club name and tag of the club you're experiencing issues with? ^.^
Could you help the rest of us who commented on this post out as well, not only North American players?

Sure. Just make sure to directly reply to me the first time around. I won't receive a notification of your comment unless your reply directly to me, since I wasn't the OP of this discussion. :P

I wasn't able to find your club by the name you provided. Did you delete the club or leave it at any point?
